idea: San Infosec Consulting, an IS Audit as a Service (ISAaaS) software company has developed an Information Security based compliance software 'AudiTab' that automates end to end audit activities right from audit announcements, scheduling, field work , data analysis, reporting and stakeholder communication.

idea: NEWJ is a tech-media startup focused on curating and producing video content for the smartphone obsessed young Indians. The recent exponential growth of the video content market provides a huge opportunity for innovative visual storytelling in India. The company intends to fill this demand for quality content in the social and digital media space. The venture was founded by a team of young entrepreneurs led by Shalabh Upadhyay.
name: NEW EMERGING WORLD OF JOURNALISM PRIVATELIMITED

idea: DesiHangover is a social enterprise that handcrafts leather footwear. The vision is to transform a local product into a global fashion. The artisan community is skilled in a traditional, 800-year-old, art of Khavani shoemaking. Using technology and innovation, DesiHangover aspires to globalize the heritage by plowing its profits back into the core. DesiHangover's 'Adopt a School' campaign motivates the future generation of this community to see a rural art with a scope of global recognition. This makes DesiHangover a sustainable business.
name: DesiHangover

idea: WE ARE MFG. OF SOLAR HOME LIGHTING SYSTEM

idea:
It is the mission of Ativak Imports to provide complete import/export brokerage services including purchase contracts, shipping, warehousing, and delivery scheduling. The company will concentrate on special and cultural imports from India and Bangladesh. Ativak also plans to provide trade consultation services to newly started farms created.

Ativak offers complete import/export brokerage services plus inventory consulting services. As mentioned previously, this includes the following:

Supplier/buyer identification

Purchasing, contracting and consulting

Shipping

Warehousing

Delivery

It must be noted that Ativak does not posess any warehousing facilities and intends to outsource this particular service. We expect to earn revenues by charging a commission based on the value of goods moved per order.
name: Ativak Imports

idea:
Finalyzer is an analytical and consulting company providing financial advisory services with specialization in Accounting, Risk Management, Research and Taxation. We also have a division which handles the entire backend for the businesses so that they focus on their core business without worrying for processes. Since we are a startup, we understand the nuances and challenges faced by a startup and offer specific cost effective services so that ideas blossom and grow.
We provide consulting services to the companies with diversified portfolio to explore opportunities by maximizing revenue and minimizing risks by maintaining highest standards of excellence, transparency, ethics and professionalism. We at Finalyzer, offer customized solutions so as to do it right the very first time. We understand the needs of the customer and offer focused solutions which are specifically designed for them. Our defining trait is our ability to convert data and information into expert judgements across a wide range of domains, with deep expertise and complete objectivity.
Our companyâ€™s philosophy is entirely client centric with focus on providing long term benefits to our clients and maintain long term relationships. At the core of our credibility are our values of: Integrity, Trust, Analytical Rigour, Relationship Building, Commitment, and Innovation & Execution.
name: Finalyzer Consultants
